title: The Escapist Channel Update - New Content, Merchandise, Membership Perks & More!
description:

title: Mario and Luigi: Bowser's Inside Story (Zero Punctuation Re-Release)
description:
**Re-Release** The Zero Punctuation episode of Mario and Luigi: Bowser's Inside Story was never officially released by The Escapist on YouTube in a standalone format. Thanks to the community request, now it has. Enjoy!
